description: Golden sample baselines for bookend video regression testing. 8 samples active. Version 2.1.0 hardens 006-multichar and 008-lighting for coherence (object consistency, artifact prevention).

thresholds._notes: startFrameMatch/endFrameMatch thresholds lowered to 25/35% based on empirical observation that FLF2V produces ~35-40% pixel similarity even with correct endpoint preservation

sample-001-geometric.name: Geometric Shapes Motion
sample-001-geometric.notes: Simple geometric shapes - baseline simplicity test for motion quality

sample-002-character.name: Character Consistency Test
sample-002-character.notes: Single character with distinctive features - tests identity preservation

sample-003-environment.name: Environment Stability Test
sample-003-environment.notes: Detailed cafe interior with camera pan - tests background consistency

sample-004-motion.name: Person Walking Motion
sample-004-motion.notes: Tests motion coherence with a person walking across frame - moderate complexity for temporal consistency validation

sample-005-complex.name: Complex Scene Transition
sample-005-complex.notes: Kitchen scene with multiple objects and subtle environmental changes - tests handling of complex multi-element scenes. HARDENED 2025-12-03 with explicit object descriptions.

sample-006-multichar.name: Depth Motion with Foreground/Background
sample-006-multichar.notes: Coffee cup in foreground with barista in background - tests multi-plane temporal consistency and depth of field preservation. HARDENED 2025-12-03 for object consistency (single mug, single pitcher, no vessel changes).

sample-007-occlusion.name: Person Occlusion Test
sample-007-occlusion.notes: Person walks behind lamppost and re-emerges - tests identity consistency through occlusion

sample-008-lighting.name: Lighting Transition Test
sample-008-lighting.notes: Daylight to lamp light transition - tests stability under dramatic lighting changes. HARDENED 2025-12-03 for artifact prevention (no flicker, no black frames, no distortion).
